title: Drug shortages: Limited warnings, followed by rationing and hoarding

title_detail.value: Drug shortages: Limited warnings, followed by rationing and hoarding

summary: In a national survey, hospital pharmacy managers report a lack of advance notice, frequent drug shortages, hoarding and even rationing. Improving the supply of generic medications and creating novel strategies to manage scarce drugs is needed.
